trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for strongly typed connection string builders.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para a ligação com tipo seguro construtores de cadeia.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class provides the base class from which the strongly typed connection string builders (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>, and so on) derive.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DbConnectionStringBuilder fornece a partir do qual o tipo seguro cadeia de ligação construtores de classe base (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>, e assim sucessivamente) derivar.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de cadeia de ligação permitem aos programadores programaticamente criar cadeias de ligação correta, analisar e reconstruir as cadeias de ligação existente.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder has been defined in a database-agnostic manner.
trans-unit.target: O DbConnectionStringBuilder foi definida de forma agnóstico de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: Because of the addition of the <xref:System.Data.Common> namespace, developers require a base class against which they can program in order to build connection strings that can work against an arbitrary database.
trans-unit.target: Devido a adição do <xref:System.Data.Common>espaço de nomes, os programadores necessitam de uma classe base relativamente ao qual pode programa para criar cadeias de ligação que podem trabalhar em relação a uma base de dados arbitrário.</xref:System.Data.Common>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the DbConnectionStringBuilder class lets users assign arbitrary key/value pairs and pass the resulting connection string to a strongly typed provider.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a classe de DbConnectionStringBuilder permite aos utilizadores atribuir pares chave/valor arbitrário e passar a cadeia de ligação resultantes para um fornecedor de tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: All the data providers that are included as part of the .NET Framework provide a strongly typed class that inherits from DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os fornecedores de dados que estão incluídos como parte do .NET Framework fornecem uma classe com tipo seguro que herda de DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The developer can build, assign, and edit connection strings for any arbitrary provider.
trans-unit.target: O programador pode criar, atribuir e editar as cadeias de ligação para qualquer fornecedor arbitrário.

trans-unit.source: For providers that support specific key/value pairs, the connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known pairs.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecedores de suportem de pares chave/valor específico, o construtor de cadeia de ligação fornece as propriedades de tipo seguro correspondente para os pares conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: In order to support providers that require the ability to support unknown values, developers can also supply arbitrary key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Para suportar fornecedores que necessitam da capacidade para suportar valores desconhecidos, os programadores também podem fornecer pares chave/valor arbitrário.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementa de classe DbConnectionStringBuilder o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This means that the class works with Visual Studio designers at design time.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que a classe funciona com os designers de Visual Studio no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys.
trans-unit.target: Quando os programadores de utilizam o estruturador para criar conjuntos de dados com tipo seguro e ligações com tipo seguro no Visual Studio, a classe de construtor de cadeia de ligação com tipo seguro irá apresentar as propriedades associadas ao respetivo tipo, será também conversores podem mapear os valores comuns para chaves conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class or one of its strongly typed derivatives to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores que necessita criar cadeias de ligação como parte das aplicações podem utilizar a classe de DbConnectionStringBuilder ou um dos respetivos derivados de tipo seguro para criar e modificar as cadeias de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DbConnectionStringBuilder também torna mais fácil de gerir as cadeias de ligação armazenadas num ficheiro de configuração de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Developers can create connection strings using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores podem criar cadeias de ligação utilizando uma classe com tipo seguro ligação cadeia builder ou podem utilizar a classe de DbConnectionStringBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder performs no checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: O DbConnectionStringBuilder não faz verificações para pares chave/valor válido.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, é possível utilizar esta classe para criar cadeias de ligação inválido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> supports only key/value pairs that are supported by SQL Server; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>suporta apenas chave/valor pares que são suportadas pelo SQL Server; a tentar adicionar pares inválidos irá gerar uma exceção.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A> method and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property handle tries to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>método e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>identificador de propriedade tenta inserir entradas maliciosas.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o seguinte código escapes corretamente o par chave/valor aninhada: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [c#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` o resultado é a seguinte cadeia de ligação que processa o valor inválido de forma segura:``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class, optionally using ODBC rules for quoting values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe, utilizando opcionalmente regras ODBC para colocar entre aspas valores.

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `true`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses ODBC rules for quoting values (surrounding values with curly braces ({})).
trans-unit.target: Se `useOdbcRules` é `true`, este <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>utiliza regras ODBC para colocar entre aspas valores (envolvente valores com chavetas ({})).</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `false`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses quotation mark character ("") to delimit values.
trans-unit.target: Se `useOdbcRules` é `false`, este <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>utiliza o caráter de aspas ("") para delimitar os valores.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar {} para delimitar campos; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para utilizar o entre aspas.

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma entrada com o nome da chave e valor para o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property can also be used to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade também pode ser utilizada para adicionar novos elementos definindo o valor de uma chave que não existe no dicionário.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Add method by passing a null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método Add através da transmissão de um valor nulo (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) chave emite um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: However, calling the Add method by passing a null value removes the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a chamar o método Add por um valor nulo remove o par chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: The key to add to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave para adicionar o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O valor para a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma forma segura e eficiente para acrescentar uma chave e valor a um existente <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>objeto.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when you add key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite aos programadores utilizando um <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>para criar uma coleção de pares chave-valor para ser capazes de tirar partido das funcionalidades incluídas no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe quando adicionar pares chave/valor, sem ter de assumir o overhead inerente criar e manter um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O `AppendKeyValuePair` método formata a chave e valor corretamente e adiciona a nova cadeia fornecida <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>ao qual pretende adicionar o par chave/valor.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: A chave a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: O valor da chave fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma forma segura e eficiente para acrescentar uma chave e valor a um existente <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>objeto.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when adding key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite aos programadores utilizando um <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>para criar uma coleção de pares chave-valor para ser capazes de tirar partido das funcionalidades incluídas no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe ao adicionar os pares chave/valor, sem ter de assumir o overhead inerente criar e manter um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O `AppendKeyValuePair` método formata a chave e valor corretamente e adiciona a nova cadeia fornecida <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Although most data sources let you delimit fields by using quotation marks, ODBC does not--for ODBC connection strings, you must use curly braces ({}).
trans-unit.target: Embora a maioria das origens de dados permitem-lhe delimitar campos utilizando aspas, ODBC não – para cadeias de ligação de ODBC, tem de utilizar chavetas ({}).

trans-unit.source: In order to have the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> use ODBC rules for delimiting fields, set the `useOdbcRules` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para poder efetuar a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>utilizar regras ODBC para delimitador campos, defina o `useOdbcRules` parâmetro `true`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>ao qual pretende adicionar o par chave/valor.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: A chave a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: O valor da chave fornecido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar {} para delimitar os campos, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para utilizar o entre aspas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property is visible in Visual Studio designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>propriedade está visível no designers do Visual Studio.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Developers creating designers that take advantage of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class must be able to make the connection string visible or invisible within the designer's property grid.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores criar designers tirarem partido do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe tem de conseguir efetuar a cadeia de ligação visível ou invisível dentro da grelha de propriedades do estruturador.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The BrowsableConnectionString property lets developers indicate that the property should be invisible by setting the property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BrowsableConnectionString permite aos programadores indicar que a propriedade deve ser invisível definindo a propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection string is visible within designers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cadeia de ligação é visível no designers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Limpa o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os pares chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>e repõe a todas as propriedades correspondentes.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This includes setting the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0 and the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui a definição de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>propriedade como 0 e o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade como uma cadeia vazia.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects on the associated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> objetos associada <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by designers to clear all associated property descriptors on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado pelos designers para limpar todos os descritores de propriedade associados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string associated with the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de ligação associada a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property returns a semicolon-delimited list of key/value pairs stored within the collection maintained by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve uma lista delimitada por ponto e vírgula dos pares chave/valor armazenados dentro da coleção mantida por <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Each pair contains the key and value, separated by an equal sign.
trans-unit.target: Cada par contém a chave e valor, separados por um sinal de igual.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte ilustra uma cadeia de ligação típica.

trans-unit.source: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ``` Data providers may expect specific keys and values for each connection string property.
trans-unit.target: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ```Fornecedores de dados poderão esperar específicas chaves e valores para cada propriedade de cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: , These values are documented individually.
trans-unit.target: , Estes valores estão documentados individualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class does not validate the key/value pairs associated with its connection string, although classes that inherit from it can.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe não validar os pares chave/valor associados à respetiva cadeia de ligação, embora as classes que herdadas dela possível</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class acts generally as a mechanism for creating and parsing semicolon-delimited lists of key/value pairs separated with equal signs.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ConnectionString o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe geralmente age como um mecanismo para criar e analisar apresenta uma lista delimitada por ponto e vírgula dos pares chave/valor separadas por sinais de igual.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: It provides no validation or other support specific to connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Fornece nenhuma validação ou outro suporte específico para cadeias de ligação.

trans-unit.source: If you add items to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> collection, the ConnectionString property will reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: Se adicionar itens para a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>coleção, a propriedade ConnectionString irá refletir as alterações.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value to the ConnectionString property, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> will try to parse the value, using the semicolon and equal-sign delimiters.
trans-unit.target: Se atribuir um valor para a propriedade ConnectionString, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>irá tentar analisar o valor, utilizando os delimitadores de ponto e vírgula e sinal de igual.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The current connection string, created from the key/value pairs that are contained within the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação atual, criada a partir de pares chave/valor que estão incluídos os <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string argument has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Foi fornecido um argumento de cadeia de ligação inválido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém uma chave específica.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém uma entrada com especificado chave; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the current number of keys that are contained within the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número atual de chaves que estão incluídos os <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: The number of keys that are contained within the connection string maintained by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O número de chaves que são incluídos a cadeia de ligação mantida pelo <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Compares the connection information in this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object with the connection information in the supplied object.
trans-unit.target: Compara as informações de ligação deste <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objeto com as informações de ligação no objeto fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Comparisons on key names are case insensitive; value comparisons are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Comparações nos nomes de chaves são sensível; comparações de valor são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The EquivalentTo method returns `true` if the key/value pairs are equal, regardless of their order.
trans-unit.target: O método EquivalentTo devolve `true` se os pares chave/valor são iguais, independentemente da respetiva ordem.

trans-unit.source: The connection behavior of the two connection strings are equivalent, because order is never significant within connection strings.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de ligação de duas cadeias de ligação são equivalentes, porque a ordem é nunca significativa dentro de cadeias de ligação.

trans-unit.source: However, different order may affect connection pooling behavior of connections based on these connection strings.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ordem diferente pode afetar o comportamento de ligações com base nestas cadeias de ligação de agrupamento de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> to be compared with this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> a ser comparada com esta <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection information in both of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> objects causes an equivalent connection string; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as informações de ligação em ambos os <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objetos faz com que uma cadeia de ligação equivalente; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection does not allow adding or removing elements after the collection is created, but it does allow modifying existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de tamanho fixo não permite a adição ou remoção de elementos depois da coleção é criada, mas permitir a modificação de elementos existentes.

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including adding or removing elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de tamanho fixo é apenas uma coleção com um wrapper que impede a adição e remoção de elementos; Por conseguinte, caso sejam feitas alterações para a colecção subjacente, incluindo a adição ou remoção de elementos, a coleção de tamanho fixo reflete essas alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem fixa tamanho; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection does not allow adding, removing, or modifying elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção só de leitura não permite adicionar, remover ou modificar elementos depois da coleção é criada.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção só de leitura é apenas uma coleção com um wrapper que impede a modificar a coleção; Por conseguinte, caso sejam feitas alterações para a colecção subjacente, a coleção só de leitura reflete essas alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é só de leitura, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor associado à chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, se a chave especificada já existe no dicionário, o valor é substituído; caso contrário, é criado um novo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item obter ou definir.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O valor associado à chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: If the specified key is not found, trying to get it returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), and trying to set it creates a new element using the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Se a chave especificada não é encontrada, ao tentar efetuar get-devolve uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic), e tentar definir-cria um novo elemento de utilizando a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: Passing a null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: Transmissão de um valor nulo (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) chave emite um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.target: Atribuir um valor nulo remove o par chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores existentes no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não foi especificado, mas não os valores associados na mesma ordem o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the keys in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não é uma cópia estática; em vez disso, <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>refere-se novamente as chaves de original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, as alterações <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>são refletidas no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Returns the connection string associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a cadeia de ligação associada a este <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor correspondente na chave fornecida deste <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to first call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método TryGetValue permite aos programadores possam obter um valor de um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>sem necessitar de ligar pela primeira vez para o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: Porque TryGetValue não gerar uma exceção ao chamar, transmitir uma chave não existente, não é necessário que procurar uma chave antes de obter o respetivo valor.

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key will place the null value (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Chamar TryGetValue com uma chave atribui irá colocar o valor nulo (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) no `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a obter.

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to the `key`.
trans-unit.target: O valor correspondente a `key`.

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Se keyword foi encontrado na cadeia de ligação, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: keyword contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordcontém um valor nulo ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores no <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores existentes no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não foi especificado, mas é a mesma ordem como as chaves associadas no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the values in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não é uma cópia estática; em vez disso, <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>refere-se novamente para os valores existentes na original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, as alterações <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>são refletidas no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores no <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
